VTD::VtdEncryption

VTD::VtdEncryption Class Reference

#include <VtdEncryption.h>

Static Public Member Functions

static VtdEncryption * load (const std::string &pluginPath)
static bool unload ()
static bool checkFileExtension (const std::string &filename)

Detailed Description

VtdEncryption interface class load function is implemented to load the VtdEncryption plugin instance decryptFile and encryptFile functions must be implemented by the plugin which is inherited from this class

Member Function Documentation

bool VTD::VtdEncryption::checkFileExtension ( const std::string &  filename  )  [static]

Check for the file extension for encrypted file

Parameters:
filename name or path of the file to be encrypted
Returns:
true if success, false if fail

Load and return an instance of a VtdEncryption plugin

Parameters:
pluginPath the path for the plugin's shared library file
Returns:
VtdEncryption plugin instance loaded from the shared library file

bool VTD::VtdEncryption::unload (  )  [static]

Unload the instance of a VtdEncryption plugin

Returns:
true if there is nothing to unload or it is unloaded successfully, false if it can not unload(dlclose fails).
